author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...GABRIELLE STRENGTHENS... ...FORECAST TO PASS EAST OF BERMUDA TONIGHT...
summary: ...GABRIELLE STRENGTHENS... ...FORECAST TO PASS EAST OF BERMUDA TONIGHT... As of 5:00 AM AST Mon Sep 22 the center of Gabrielle was located near 30.0, -62.5 with movement NNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 978 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 90 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...GABRIELLE STRENGTHENS... ...FORECAST TO PASS EAST OF BERMUDA TONIGHT... As of 5:00 AM AST Mon Sep 22 the center of Gabrielle was located near 30.0, -62.5 with movement NNW at 10 mph. The minimum central pressure was 978 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 90 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Gabrielle (AT2/AL072025)
